description: Try our easy to follow Strawberry Blonde recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Drink,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Dec 2019,Sesame free,Summer,Strawberry,Halal,Christmas,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Peanut free
name: Strawberry Blonde Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Reserve 4 strawberries and hull and halve remainder. purée strawberries, orange juice and syrup together in a blender until smooth.
Half fill glasses with ice. Add purée and top up with ginger beer. Serve garnished with reserved strawberries.
